DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess growth preterm infant feed test formula compare standard formula first 4 month correct gestational age .
DOC.criteria: Born AGA Exclusively formulafed 2834 week GA birth Intact GI tract , tolerate full oral feed Expected discharged hospital within minimum 24 hour , maximum 5 day Severe respiratory disease define needing mechanical ventilation discharge Any significant systemic disease could affect growth . This include cardiac , neurologic , GI condition . Major congenital malformation , history GI surgery , severe postnatal complication Daily routine diuretic use time discharge Receiving 10 % daily kcals food additive thickener Currently participate participate another conflict clinical trial .
